msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuit Courts, Western District of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1890-1901, vol 1

div1.p: In re. Application of John Leonard for Writ of Habeas Corpus.
United States Circuit Court for the District of Washington. In the matter of the application of John Leonard for Writ of Habeus Corpus vs. R.A. Simms Sheriff of Whitman County, Washington
